messages.title: BREXIT CAN BE BETTER
messages.content: If you think I understand you a little better than the current Westminster crowd, you know what to do. Vote for me on Dec 12th. Give yourself a voice that will be heard.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposes having the country's law-making outsourced to continental bureaucrats who don't believe in democracy.
Supports a reasonable immigration system that doesn't discriminate by race and doesn't let economic migration run rampant.
Against higher taxes and suggests that the countryside should not be paved over and neither return to 1950s culture nor a 1970s economy.

mentions.candidate: I'm going to assume you want to live free in a democratic country...

issues.economy: Against higher taxes to have the countryside paved over and neither return to 1950s culture nor a 1970s economy.
issues.environment: Suggests the countryside should not be paved over.
issues.governance: Opposes law-making outsourced to continental bureaucrats and implies a desire to improve the current state of democracy.
issues.immigration: Supports a reasonable immigration system that doesn't let economic migration run rampant.

housing.content: Against higher taxes to have the countryside paved over...

leaflet.personalStatement: Dear Voter, ... democratic country, ... British culture was celebrated not destroyed, ... prefer a reasonable immigration system that doesn't discriminate by race and doesn't let economic migration run rampant.

contactInformation.address: c/o Unit 1, Griffin's Common, Cropwell Road, Radcliffe on Trent Nottingham NG12 2JZ

images.caption: A portrait of Matthew Faithfull with UKIP branding.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet emphasizes the candidate's perceived understanding of the voter's wishes regarding democracy, immigration, and taxation without outlining a detailed policy framework.
